website_summaries.verdict: An attractive toaster great for smaller spaces or storage.
pros: Smudge-proof silver finish looks great on the countertop
A convenient cord wrap area helps it store away easily
Automatic off, extra-wide slots, high-lift toast boost, and slide-out crumb tray are nice features for this price range
cons: The metal casing can dent easily

customer_reviews.title: It's a toaster! I read toaster reviews until it ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a toaster! I read toaster reviews until it became ridiculous. Who knew there were so many "toaster connoisseurs" out there. You could spend more - lots more - but it's gonna do the same thing. Hamilton Beach has been doing this for a VERY long time and, sure enough, they've got it right. Imagine that. It toasts evenly, can accommodate all (normal) sizes of bread, bagels, and English muffins, is subtle in terms of style and footprint, and just works. If you're just sick and tired of your money ... you can get rid of plenty of it on the supposedly high-end toasters ... but they're gonna do the exact same thing this does.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It works like a toaster is supposed to work!
customer_reviews.text: I read dozens of reviews for toasters on Amazon. I truly didn't expect there to be some many concerns with such a simple appliance. After discovering so many toasters had more than 10% of 1-star reviews, I then looked for the one that had the least amount of 1-star reviews. This was the one! It was also one of the lowest priced models. The toaster came quickly and it's been working like a toaster should. It toasts evenly on both sides, it's easy to adjust and the slots are big enough for a sliced bagel. And the outside does not get dangerously hot. I'm a happy consumer now. Try this model and you'll be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl wachtel

customer_reviews.title: Looks sharp and compact
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to our 4 slice behemoth toaster that just took up too much space on our counter. One bit of advice. Really wide bread slices need to be slightly squished down to fit inside. Then just lift the handle and use your butter knife to lift the slice safely out when it's done toasting. It also takes a bit longer than larger models to toast slices.
customer_reviews.author: Amber S.

customer_reviews.title: It caught on fire
customer_reviews.text: Bought this less than two months ago. I was making toast and it sparked and caught on fire. I would not buy this if I were you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Appliance - ?Skin Deep?
customer_reviews.text: Received in late MAY '17.. Makes beautiful toast with even color throughout... HOWEVER, recently it has developed a habit of often having the 'hold down' mechanism refuse to work unless the toaster has cooled off from the previous toast.. Sometimes it works / sometimes not... Currently we are still hopeful !
customer_reviews.author: Ivison D. Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: I have never been more disgusted with a toaster as I am right now. I can't get the bread to stay down....Works when it feels like it. I would never recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: k.b.b.

customer_reviews.title: Three times is not always the charm
customer_reviews.text: Toaster arrived, lot of hearing elements didn't light up so uneven toasting...parts of bread untoasted. Ordered a second, figuring we just a bad one....little better, still very uneven toasting. Tried one last time, mainly because we really wanted a toaster sitting horizontally on the counter where you could still see toast options. Same story . Sadly, all three being sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Susan "Celine"

customer_reviews.title: A toast to this toaster
customer_reviews.text: Great looking basic toaster that does what toasters do best. You may need to cut your wider bakery breads in half to fit (hello, delicious Publix sourdough), but it does my bagels and Nature's Own just swell.
customer_reviews.author: Tee Bellflower

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy flimsy flimsy - embarrassingly cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is so bad I’m embarrassed for anyone to see it in our house. Knobs are loose and tinny, frame is tinny, only heats one side, doesn’t work properly, temperature gauge not readable - and all this was right out the box. I reinstated my old solid Breville. My college-age daughter doesn’t even want what she calls the “junky toaster” in her dorm. We tossed it. It’s like a toy toaster for a child, it’s made so abysmally. Actually, the level of junk is rather shocking.
customer_reviews.author: Lk

customer_reviews.title: Does not toast both sides of the bread evenly, ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not toast both sides of the bread evenly, one side is always less toasted. After a month or so it now barely toasts the bread even at the highest mark so I have to toast the bread twice to even get a regular shade of toast. Would not buy again and am actively looking for another to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: HJ

customer_reviews.title: Good toast, no problems
customer_reviews.text: This toaster has a nice footprint. I avoided buying one for years because I don't like junk on the counter, but this looks nice and doesn't take up too much space. The defrost feature works well, too. The nob allows for setting to just the right level so if you like it half-burnt or whatever, you can achieve your dream of perfect toast. The only downside is the cord holder is on the bottom. While this is nice for aesthetics, it's inconvenient when the thing is hot. I just store mine in the corner so the cord is not visible.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Sleek attractive unit.  Doesn't readily toast, often takes 2 attempts to get lever engaged.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sleek pretty unit, but after recent issues with an HB coffee maker (died after 5 months and then replacement also died after 5 months), very concerned about durability. It's often difficult to get the lever to engage to start toasting. Pretty much takes two attempts to engage. Bought so recently (within a month of this review), too early to address ease of cleaning or durability. Still trying to dial in the proper toasting setting... Does have nice features like bagel, cancel, not 100% sure how well defrost feature works...
customer_reviews.author: Gail Mc2

customer_reviews.title: Nice littler toaster
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of anxiety buying a toaster to replace our 5.00 Hamilton Beach one that always worked great (but got hot). I had no idea people could be so opinionated about the state of their toast. This one works fine. I do not evaluate how toasted one side is to the other, but I never have a complaint and it's a nice feature it doesn't get to warm on the outside. This was a good purchase, and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: BK NY

customer_reviews.title: I really really wanted to like this toaster
customer_reviews.text: I really really wanted to like this toaster. I love the look. But 'twas not to be. It did not toast evenly and the top got really hot. Sent it back and bought a great four slicer. A little clunky but toasts perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ann C. Burgoyne

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't toast the bottom - don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking toaster and fits well on my counter. Unfortunately, it doesn't toast evenly. The bottom of the bread is very light while the top is very dark. I would return it, but it is too late. Don't buy this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and has most of the features you want
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and has most of the features you want. The big negative is that with bagels or anything thicker you have to kind of force them down into the cage. It's almost like the never tested anything bigger than an English muffin. Been using it for 3 months now and it does work OK beyond subpar cage.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster!
customer_reviews.text: I live this toaster. It does not take up much counter room since it is made to sit lengthwise on the counter. Works great also. Even toasting and easy to get English Muffins out.
customer_reviews.author: S. Slaughter

customer_reviews.title: Cutest toaster I've ever owned...
customer_reviews.text: Not only did this contribute to giving me a little more counter space with its compact size, it looks adorable! I love seeing it there. My husband did have some trouble with his thicker-than-normal bread popping up easily. But for a regular piece of bread or frozen waffle it isn't any problem. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: THIS is the toaster to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It’s exactly as described. Durable, quality construction. I love how there is no possible for my toast or whatnot to slip and get stuck down in between the toaster slot. I’d buy it again just for that reason alone! Oh, and the toaster boost is an awesome feature.
customer_reviews.author: Jennay

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for an inexpensive toaster
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for an inexpensive toaster. Took off one star because the metal body is VERY thin. I put a dent in it with light pressure. Be careful in handling.
customer_reviews.author: Kona

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than the pic looks and will not hardly toast anything unless it's on its highest setting
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: A good toaster if you only want to use it a ...
customer_reviews.text: Has a flimsy feel. Difficult to get the setting correct so that it either under toasts or over toasts. Only 2 months out And the pop-up mechanism is failing to stick half the time. We have to put it down three or four times before we can get it to engage. A good toaster if you only want to use it a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Monty Stambler

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this toaster is an excellent value. It toasts evenly every time. Cleans up well. I like the design with the controls on the radius so you can view them from the front.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Good toaster with a nice design
customer_reviews.text: The sleek design of the toaster blends in with our stainless steel appliances. I like that it's narrow enough so it doesn't take up a lot of space or lend a bulky feel that many toasters do. Toasts our bread well, so what's to complain about?
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: This one on the other hand works great. Produces an even toasting
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased a lot of toasters online over the past 8 years. In the old days toasters were very simple, they would just last forever. But up until this purchase of this unit all my prior purchases resulted in toasters that broke or toasted unevenly after a short period of time. This one on the other hand works great. Produces an even toasting. The defrost setting actually works. The settings are very sensitive to the exact variation you want. This toaster is a good value. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Geffcken

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Some may think it’s dumb to want a toaster to be pretty..but I do, and this is!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price, looks good on my counter. Easily fits a bagel, but toasts uneven. Top of the bagel was barely toasted, bottom was a perfect golden brown. Can't complain too much at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It is sleek and cooks the toast perfectly. I like that it doesn't beep when the toast is done. It's quiet!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3 boys

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted (needed)
customer_reviews.text: Works very well to toast bread throughly and evenly the 3 or 4 times I've used it. Haven't tried it for bagels or the defrost feature yet. It came well packaged. It's much easier than using the oven broiler.
customer_reviews.author: willowayno

customer_reviews.title: Nice toaster
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and works fine. Sometimes big round slices don't quite fit all the way in.
customer_reviews.author: P. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this toaster for sometime now and I have to say we love it. It toasts well on all sides. I would recommend this toaster to anyone. It also it has a really nice look to it. Very happy with product
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy R. Oleson

customer_reviews.title: A basic toaster looks great and toasts perfectly
customer_reviews.text: A basic toaster looks great and toasts perfectly. Glad we got it. Done with stupid toaster ovens. Price can’t be beat for the quality
customer_reviews.author: sugah

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using for a couple weeks now and I like it, easy to use for me and my 14 and 8 year old kids. Looks nice and works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Joanmarie Curran

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Toast!
customer_reviews.text: I have never, ever, had a toaster that toasted so evenly and consistently. Each time the entire slice is toasted, and the darkness is identical to the time before. It doesn't look fancy. It just looks like a plain toaster. I purchased it for the small footprint and because the controls were facing forward when the long side was against the wall. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have my setting on medium perfect toast every time.No problems so far
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Halstead

customer_reviews.title: all what you need
customer_reviews.text: It is a boater.... what should I review? great value!!!!
customer_reviews.author: German

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight, doesn't toast evenly. It is nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: pam rollins

customer_reviews.title: Son took it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for husband and I but son fell in love with it and took it home with him. He uses it all the time and loves it becauses bagels, waffels, texas toast, everything fits in it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Farley

customer_reviews.title: Outside of toaster gets hot enough to leave a nasty burn
customer_reviews.text: Be careful. Got a bad burn on the thumb nuckle taking a piece of toast out of the toaster
customer_reviews.author: cheri curtis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, small toaster that holds large slices of bread or bagels!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect toaster for my mom. Mom lives in a Senior Residence and the kitchens are tiny.
customer_reviews.author: nancy j. martin

customer_reviews.title: Does not toast evenly
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of reading of reviews on Amazon to find a decent low-pried toaster. My research led me to this one. It's not awful, but it generally toasts just one side. You have to flip the item and toast again to get it to toast somewhat evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine G.

customer_reviews.title: Problem with toaster
customer_reviews.text: the toaster arrived missing two of the small rubber inserts which go into the "feet" of the toaster. I couldn't reach customer service but was able to fix this myself with small rubber pads I had in my craft supplies. Otherwise it would have scratched my counter top.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: toasts unevenly
customer_reviews.text: First time we used this toaster the bread slices burned on one edge and barely toasted on the other. Put it in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: JC on San Juan Island

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work well and looks nice with all my other stainless steel appliances without taking up much counter space.
customer_reviews.author: RSKP

customer_reviews.title: Toasts evenly. Beautiful design.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first toaster we've had in years that actually toasts evenly. I'm also liking the smudge-proof finish and simple, elegant design.
customer_reviews.author: K.L.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer be aware
customer_reviews.text: WE used our last toaster for over 10 years. I look at a lot of products before I purchased this toaster. I am sorry to say that the toaster coil broke in less than a few months and I had to buy a new toaster. The toaster is really flimsy. DONT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Roshanak

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works just as you would want it to. Plus, it's quiet!! Our former toaster would "ding" when you pressed the handle down, and then again when it was done. I found that annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Nice looking and affordable. Chrome matches the chrome in my kitchen. What is not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Jess from CA

customer_reviews.title: Item works great, looks sleek on my countertop
customer_reviews.text: Item works great, looks sleek on my countertop. No issues and we have been using daily for 6 months now.
customer_reviews.author: GigiC

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Does anyone make a roster that really does brown to dark without running it through twice.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Broke earlier than expected
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 2 years. We didn't use it much either.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: seems to do a fine job at toasting. Nice look too.
customer_reviews.author: Shellie

customer_reviews.title: Good toaster, small and compact enough to put away ...
customer_reviews.text: Good toaster, small and compact enough to put away in cabinets after each use. I like the crumb tray as well for cleaning after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P Lowen

customer_reviews.title: We are satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't take forever for a piece of toast, so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pick another toaster
customer_reviews.text: One of the supports a twisted within a month or two so one slice of bread won’t come up. The difference of one degree of toast to another feels drastic so you get burnt black toast or barely toasted bread.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Scheidler

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster! Very modern and sleek looking, also works great!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I refuse to spend big bucks on a toaster. This one looks great and what do you know...it does the job, it makes toast! I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: the outside gets so hot, I burned my finger. Doesn't toast well at all, Had to put on the highest to get it toasted. I've always have had hamilton beach products, but no more. Guess I should have read the low reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: UNEVEN TOASTING
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this toaster for a while and I'm so disappointed about it as it is not a cheap one. SO UNEVEN toasting...part of the bread is always OVER-toasted no matter which level I chose.
customer_reviews.author: Anrong Chen

customer_reviews.title: Good if you have time
customer_reviews.text: Does not live up to review thsy orompted my buying it. Nothing toasts on the first try, needs at least 2 complete cycles on Max time to toast english muffin and then some more
customer_reviews.author: Rich de

customer_reviews.title: I chose this toaster for the simplicity and easy way to use it and has not disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I chose this toaster for the simplicity and easy way to use it and has not disappointed. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Works well, love the pop-up lever
customer_reviews.text: Our last toaster died from a wire we broke when pulling out a piece of bread. The lever that pops finished toast up higher is brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Eliz

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice and a good looking toaster that doesn't take up a lot of space on the kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: Chrary

customer_reviews.title: This toaster is very nice, were it not for the stainless finish I ...
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is very nice, were it not for the stainless finish I would give it a 5. Toasts on both sides of the bread to the user that that is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Braden Leighty

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Slow to warm up and toast.. Not suitable for top half of english muffins--burns on edges, pale in middle.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Burns the top of the toast
customer_reviews.text: The product worked great for the first 30 days and now burns the top of the toast every time to a crisp. It may be a faulty unit if so I'd love a replacement and will adjust my review. Until then stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it, ours broke after less than a year
customer_reviews.text: It was a good toaster, if a bit flimsy feeling...for about 10 months. Then the bits of metal that the toast sits on somehow caught on the internals of the toaster and it stopped popping up at all and it got super broken.
customer_reviews.author: Kate W

customer_reviews.title: Handy toaster
customer_reviews.text: I like the size, toasts pretty evenly. Just the "stainless" finish shows any finger prints
customer_reviews.author: BisonGuy

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well wish it had a better crumb tray but overall good item
customer_reviews.author: Jm

customer_reviews.title: Cool Toaster
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster! It works great and looks cool. Even my husband loves the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyDaisy

customer_reviews.title: This is our 3rd Hamilton Beach and every one of them has been great. Great price also
customer_reviews.text: We have tried expensive toasters and you can forget them. This is our 3rd Hamilton Beach and every one of them has been great. Great price also.
customer_reviews.author: Tom R

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Looks Pricier than one would think
customer_reviews.text: Bagel option works really well. Nice and narrow so fits perfect for our small office kitchenette.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Average toaster
customer_reviews.text: Good toaster for the low price. Toasts the bread evenly. But the spring mechanism does not seem to “pop” the toast very high once completed, requiring one to manually lift the toaster leve mechanism to access the toast.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A nice simple toaster. Does the job and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a little difficult to determine the right "toast level". Usually, end up with burnt and too lightly toasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meets or exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Meets and or exceeds expectations. If it lasts longer then 2 years I'll be even more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkster

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking, works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Sharp matte finish, well made. Works very well with easy to manage controls.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Dombrowski

customer_reviews.title: doesn't toast evenly
customer_reviews.text: Left my waffles burnt on one side and warm and mushy on the other side,
customer_reviews.author: Janet G.

customer_reviews.title: Be aware that the warranty does not cover shipping costs ...
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that the warranty does not cover shipping costs! The toaster broke after 6 months of light use and the manufacturer asked me to pay shipping costs of the replacement for almost $12. I paid $26 for the toaster. This is not fair.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto

customer_reviews.title: Does a nice even job of toasting
customer_reviews.text: It toasts, that what a toaster is built for. Does a nice even job of toasting. Especially like the pop up feature to pull out small muffins.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Coulter

customer_reviews.title: Good for a few months.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this toaster for less than 6 months and one side already doesn't spring inward to hold the bread slice, and it doesn't rise to the highest temperature like it did when we first bought it. Additionally, the top browns while the bottom remains almost untoasted. Such a disappointment - good toasters are hard to find!
customer_reviews.author: Georg Rafailidis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful toaster, it has so many ranges of toast variation!
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Only one problem...
customer_reviews.text: Only one problem...it is so lightweight that when you press down the lever the toaster lifts up on the other side. I really like this toaster, so elegantly simple and easy to clean. I love the cancel button. If I want to darken my already toasted muffin, just pop it back in for a few seconds, then cancel to pop it up.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES S.

customer_reviews.title: Love the compact size!
customer_reviews.text: I love how compact in size this toaster is. It doesn't take up a lot of real estate on my counter top. It does a great job and toasts evenly on both sides. Bagels fit with no problem. My only issue is that taller rye bread sticks out about an inch, but otherwise I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ciocia Kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my new kitchen. Love the stainless .... it's not blue as the picture makes it look.
customer_reviews.author: tgeese

customer_reviews.title: Does not release toast often. When it does release ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not release toast often. When it does release toast...it does not raise toast high enough to grab with fingers. Yeah I know - don't use a fork to fish the toast out of the toaster but it's the only way to get your toast back.
customer_reviews.author: To the Mat

customer_reviews.title: Fire and burn hazard. do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews and decided on this because of the moderate price and the awesome 4+ reviews. However, this in my opinion, is a fire or at the very least, a medical hazard. It gets so hot all over (not just the top) that you cannot touch it. I am afraid it will burn down the house or at the very least burn the kids. Do not buy and instead look for cool touch or Dualit products. So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: lizzz

customer_reviews.title: A Really Good Toaster!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toaster from Amazon a week or so ago, to replace my old, probably 7 or 8 years old toaster which had recently burned out. I chose the Hamilton Beach toaster based on the Amazon reviews and am not disappointed. I find the "Shade" control (light to dark control on my old toaster), very accurate and adjustable by fine increments. I often toast bread direct from my freezer and the "defrost" button does the job, defrosting and toasting to the preset Shade button setting. All in all one heck of a good toaster!
customer_reviews.author: W. D.

customer_reviews.title: Great look but doesn't toast complete slice of bread-----
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with the toasting levels and looks of the toaster-----------but 1/2 inch of the sandwich bread does not toast. When the bread is in the down position being toasted then the 1/2 inch top of bread is sticking out of the toaster. The bread slices I use are the standard 4&1/2 inch height.
customer_reviews.author: D. Russell

customer_reviews.title: small profile/ footprint makes this a desirable toaster
customer_reviews.text: we were looking for a good toaster that will fit our minimalist lifestyle. nothing fancy. nothing really extraordinary. just a fully functional toaster that will fit our needs for the 21st century. i am glad that i found this toaster. although i have been using it for only a few months (5 months as of this writing), i can tell everyone that we truly like the fact that it doesn't give us burnt toasts. easy to clean dirt tray. easy to clean outside stainless steel body. very low maintenance. give it a try if you're considering buying one.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Cruel

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this one!
customer_reviews.text: This model is attractive, smart-looking, and it has all the features one could ask of a toaster. It fits very well on the countertop without taking up a lot of real estate, yet it has full-sized slots for English muffins or bagels. I particularly like the placement of the controls on the side. It stays cool to touch, and toasts evenly. This was a wise purchase!
customer_reviews.author: cg

customer_reviews.title: works fine.. but no rubber tips on the bottom
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size...works fine..but no rubber tips on the bottom...very cheap and tinney.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, but oops nice and works.
customer_reviews.text: It works, doesn't ding, which my old toaster did and it scared my dog who must have thought it sounded like his invisible fence. Simple, but looks nice out on your counter.
customer_reviews.author: J. Voigt

customer_reviews.title: We have a nice high end toaster at work and it takes forever
customer_reviews.text: Ok, it's not the high end toaster some want, but it does the job and does it quickly. We have a nice high end toaster at work and it takes forever!! This is really light weight, which i like since we often move it around on the counter and to the appliance garage. But maybe almost too light, it could get tippy since the feet are pretty sticky. It looks nice and doesn't get hot on the sides, so kid friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: ... said it had a small footprint and was the greatest toaster ever
customer_reviews.text: All the reviews said it had a small footprint and was the greatest toaster ever. Just about every toaster I've had was smaller than this one. It makes okay toast.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Schwan

customer_reviews.title: Great little toaster, so far I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this toaster. I read everyone's reviews and I had no idea toast was such a hot topic! I was looking for a cheap toaster that did the job, this one fit the bill. It toasts evenly and will only allow you to lower the lever when it is plugged in. It is slim and everything about it works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: H. MCCARTHY

customer_reviews.title: Its making toast and looking pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Nice toaster. Its very pretty and guess what!? it makes toast. haha Ive been using it for a few months and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Potato People

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: We love it, bought on for our house and then bought another for our camper.
customer_reviews.author: Ajones

customer_reviews.title: The best toaster I've owned
customer_reviews.text: It does a better job of toasting evenly on both sides than the numerous others I've had. Cleaning could be made more accessible by allowing you to remove the bottom but given our litigious society, forget that. After nearly two years it is still toasting! And, it looks nice. No annoying noise to tell you when it is done which, to me, is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Electronic tech

customer_reviews.title: Uneven toasting
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's just a toaster thing....I bought this new toaster because our old one didn't toast evenly per side. This one doesn't either. One side is darker than the other so we flip it and turn it back one. Maybe my expectation of even toasting it too high.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A. Dumke

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach 22706 2 Slice Metal Toaster
product_meta.description: Make perfect toast in the Hamilton Beach 2 Slice Metal Toaster with the convenience of easy clean up and storage. This attractive toaster is made with a smudge proof brushed silver finish that won't show fingerprints.
feature_bullets: Easy cleanup with slide-out crumb tray
High-lift toast boost makes it easier to reach small slices
Extra-wide slots accommodate thick breads and bagels
Cancel, bagel & defrost - stop toasting anytime, toast bagels, or defrost and toast frozen bread in one easy step
NOTE: Bread Lifter will not latch down unless toaster is plugged in

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars292 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
